O

onAddClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method redirects users to the Add Appointment screen when the Add button is clicked.
onAddClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.CustomersController
This method takes users to the Add Customers screen when the Add button is clicked.
onAppointmentClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.CustomersController
This method takes users to the Appointments screen when the Appointments button is clicked.
onBackClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.ReportsController
This method redirects the user to the Appointments screen on click of the Back button.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AddAppointmentController
This method redirects the user back to the Appointments screen (see Helpers.createStage for additional detail).
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AddCustomerController
This method redirects the user to the Customers screen after clicking the 'Cancel' button.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This method redirects the user back to the Appointments screen when the Cancel button is clicked.
onCancelClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method redirects the user to the Customer screen on click of the Cancel button.
onCustomerClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method redirects the user to the Customers screen when they click the Customers button.
onDelete() - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method deletes an appointment if a selection if made, if not the user is prompted to select an appointment.
onDelete() - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.CustomersController
This method handles deletion of a customer when a customer is selected and the Delete button is selected.
onLoginButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.LoginFormController
This method checks if the username and password entered by the user match any rows in the database, creates a User object with the data from the matching row/redirects them to the Appointments screen (if there is a match), adds login data to the login_activity file, and checks for any appointments in the next 15 minutes/displays the results in an alert modal.
onLogoutClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method redirects the user to the Login screen, as well as clearing the current user object (to be reset on next login) when the Logout button is clicked.
onLogoutClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.CustomersController
This method redirects the user to the Login screen, as well as clearing the current user object (to be reset on next login) when the Logout button is clicked.
onModifyClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method redirects the user to the Modify Appointment screen if an appointment is selected, if not they get an alert prompting them to select an appointment.
onModifyClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.CustomersController
This method takes users to the Modify Customer screen when a customer is selected and the Modify button is clicked.
onReportClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AppointmentsController
This method redirects the user to the Reports screen when they click the Reports button.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AddAppointmentController
This method handles creating an appointment, and all the validation needed to pass in order for that to happen.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.AddCustomerController
This method handles creating a Customer.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This method handles updating an appointment, and all the validation needed to pass in order for that to happen.
onSaveClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class schrader.schedulingapp.controller.ModifyCustomerController
This method modifies a Customer to updated values, and includes validation for empty values preventing users from updating.
openConnection() - Static method in class schrader.schedulingapp.helper.JDBC
This method makes the connection to the database.
